Description: Job DescriptionA brand new clinic in Lusail is opening up and we want you to be part of it!Our founder began her medical education in Algeria and completed it in Sweden. After many years experience in Qatar, DNClinic is now ready to take off.The job involves medical consultations and minor interventions within the broad panorama of family medicine. You will be working with Dr. Naima, a consultant in Ob/Gyn and with a great reputation among patients.Skills
Skills: Details concerning salary package, incentives, annual leave will be discussed further during interview for shortlisted applicants. We welcome your application with CV, personal letter, and educational merits.

Commitment to practice-based learning and the improvement of patient care
Strong interpersonal and communication skills and a willingness to be a team worker
Solid medical foundation and willingness to practice evidence based medicine
Willingness to contribute to the further growth and development of the clinic
Arabic, English language skills necessary. French is a big added bonus.
Already located and licensed to practice in Qatar.
